welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sainte-Therese, Canada! This charming city is known for its stunning natural beauty, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all the treasures this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all cargo shipments, including freight and mail.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
